benchmark_details.name: ODE-1000
benchmark_details.overview: The ODE-1000 benchmark comprises 1,000 diverse ODE problems designed to evaluate the ability of language models to generate executable code that accurately solves ordinary differential equations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate scientific code generation capability of LLMs for solving ordinary differential equations.

data.source: Synthesized problems using GPT-4.1 derived from natural language descriptions.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is defined as the fraction of instances where the relative error L2 is less than 0.01.
methodology.interpretation: High accuracy indicates a model's ability to correctly generate numerically valid code for solving ODEs.
methodology.baseline_results: Models show significant improvements in accuracy and code execution rates post fine-tuning.
methodology.validation: Results validated through comparisons with reference solutions.
